sentences: Ei tea, kuidas sa tänaseks hakkad said.
Tunne, et see on su tänaseks parim valik.
context: The word 'tänaseks' means 'for today'. It is used to refer to an action or decision made with reference to the current day only. Commonly appears in contexts where decisions are limited to a specific timeframe, particularly when talking about what one will do on that particular day.
